ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A suite of utilities for working with the UK Biobank <https://www.ukbiobank.ac.uk/> Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy (NMR) metabolomics data <https://biobank.ndph.ox.ac.uk/showcase/label.cgi?id=220>. Includes functions for extracting biomarkers from decoded UK Biobank field data, removing unwanted technical variation from biomarker concentrations, computing an extended set of lipid, fatty acid, and cholesterol fractions, and for re-deriving composite biomarkers and ratios after adjusting data for unwanted biological variation. For further details on methods see Ritchie SC et al. Sci Data (2023) <doi:10.1038/s41597-023-01949-y>.

A suite of utilities for working with the UK Biobank <https://www.ukbiobank.ac.uk/> Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy (NMR) metabolomics data <https://biobank.ndph.ox.ac.uk/showcase/label.cgi?id=220>. Includes functions for extracting biomarkers from decoded UK Biobank field data, removing unwanted technical variation from biomarker concentrations, computing an extended set of lipid, fatty acid, and cholesterol fractions, and for re-deriving composite biomarkers and ratios after adjusting data for unwanted biological variation. For further details on methods see Ritchie SC et al. Sci Data (2023) <doi:10.1038/s41597-023-01949-y>.

name: r-ukbnmr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "3.3.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ukbnmr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ukbnmr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ukbnmr/ukbnmr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8ffa8d3ef417ef1793c79e569b93f0f53aeaccc41c653b9fedf6b7bf7672d693

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-bit64
    - r-data.table
    - r-lubridate
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mass
    - r-bit64
    - r-data.table
    - r-lubridate

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ukbnmr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ukbnmr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ukbnmr
  license: MIT
  summary: A suite of utilities for working with the UK Biobank <https://www.ukbiobank.ac.uk/> Nuclear Magnetic Resonance spectroscopy (NMR) metabolomics data <https://biobank.ndph.ox.ac.uk/showcase/label.cgi?id=220>. Includes functions for extracting biomarkers from decoded UK Biobank field data, removing unwanted technical
    variation from biomarker concentrations, computing an extended set of lipid, fatty acid, and cholesterol fractions, and for re-deriving composite biomarkers and ratios after adjusting data for unwanted biological variation. For further details on methods see Ritchie SC et al. Sci Data (2023) <doi:10.1038/s41597-023-01949-y>.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
